metadata.title: CVE-2022-48959 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: dsa: sja1105: fix memory leak in sja1105_setup_devlink_regions()When dsa_devlink_region_create failed in sja1105_setup_devlink_regions(),priv->regions is not released.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
